sentences.sContent: The speed of the windscreen wipers is variable .
sentences.sContent_eng: The speed of the windscreen wipers is variable .
sentences.sCn: 汽车挡风玻璃上雨刷的速度是可变的。

sentences.sContent: My daughter painted a scarlet bear on the windscreen of our car.
sentences.sContent_eng: My daughter painted a scarlet bear on the windscreen of our car.
sentences.sCn: 我女儿在我们的挡风玻璃上画了一只鲜红的小熊。

sentences.sContent: The attendants fill the tank, clean the windscreen, and add some air to the tires.
sentences.sContent_eng: The attendants fill the tank, clean the windscreen, and add some air to the tires.
sentences.sCn: 服务人员加满油箱，清洁挡风玻璃，把轮胎打一些气。

phrases.pCn: 挡风玻璃刮水器；风档雨雪刷

remMethod.val: wind(风) + screen(屏， 遮蔽物) → 挡风玻璃

trans.tranOther: the large window at the front of a car, bus etc
